Figure 2:Overview of H3DP. H3DP integrates three hierarchical design principles across the perception and action generation pipeline. At the input level, RGB-D images are decomposed into multiple layers based on their depth values. Then, we employ multi-scale visual representations to capture features at varying levels of granularity. During the action generation, denoising process is divided into several stages guided by multi-scale visual representations.
